plot: Set in an impoverished Chinese-American community, Cherry Bloom tells the story of a little girl gifted with extraordinary prophetic powers that her parents choose to exploit in order to level the family out of its social condition.
title: Cherry Bloom
plot_es: Set in an impoverished Chinese-American community, Cherry Bloom tells the story of a little girl gifted with extraordinary prophetic powers that her parents choose to exploit in order to level the family out of its social condition.
